column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Recently I was invited to a function at a church with a downtown location .
#text=I live in a large city that has trains that travel within the city and also go to nearby towns .
#text=There are several routes that the trains travel called lines and they are named by colors : red , green and orange .
#text=This is so passengers know what train to take to get where they want to go .
#text=The last time I went to that church I had a lot of trouble finding a parking spot , so I decided to take the train there .
#text=I knew that the train station was only a few blocks away from the church so it would be easy to get to the church .
#text=I drove to the train station closest to my house , and parked the car in the parking lot .
#text=I walked to the station , where there were many benches for passengers to sit while they waited for their trains .
#text=There was a machine on the platform that let you choose what type of ticket you needed .
#text=You could buy a ticket for only going one way or a round trip .
#text=I chose the round trip ticket since I wanted to take the train to the church and back again .
#text=The machine had a display that told me how much money I needed to deposit in the little slot .
#text=I put the money in the machine and my ticket popped out .
#text=I waited for my train to arrive .
#text=When it did , the doors opened and lots of people got off the train .
#text=I got on and everyone who was waiting for the train got on , too .
#text=I picked a seat that was facing forward , but there were seats that faced the center of the train and even ones that faced backward .
#text=The train 's doors shut and the train started to move along the rail .
#text=The train had windows on both sides and I looked out at the sights as we sped along .
#text=In a few minutes it stopped at another station , and some people got off and others got on .
#text=Pretty soon the conductor walked up and down the aisle asking to see everyone 's ticket .
#text=I showed her my ticket and she nodded and smiled .
#text=At the next station , the train stopped .
#text=This was the station that was closest to the church , so I got off .
#text=When it was time to go home , I waited at the station for the train that would take me home again .
#text=Taking the train is a lot of fun , and sometimes a lot easier than driving .
